    • Method Detail

      • getManagedFragmentHandler

        <T> ManagedFragmentHandler<T> getManagedFragmentHandler(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Returns a managed fragment handler, which contains part of an UI and can fully interact with CDI and it's parent component.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the managed fragment
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the requested managed fragment
        Returns:
        a managedFragmentHandler which gives access to the fragments controller and UI node
